info.name: Get a GM title!
info.description:
Tired of waiting for your FIDE GM title? You probably are, so I have created a system that actually works. Simply CLICK in all the right places and you will actually become a GM!!! Hope you enjoy :)

P.S. If you notice any problems, please message me.. somewhere....

This was created for lichess.org.
info.additionalInfo:
v2:

Works with lichess better and actually almost looks convincing. I've been tricked myself a few times while making this, wondering when player x became a GM.
